output_list.reason: Integer overflow in increaseApproval function allows the owner to increase the balance of an arbitrary spender.
Integer overflow in decreaseApproval function allows the owner to decrease the balance of an arbitrary spender.
Integer overflow in mint function allows the owner to create a new token for a given buyer.
Integer overflow in pullBack function allows the owner to retrieve a specific amount of tokens from a given buyer.
Integer overflow in showMyTokenBalance function allows the owner to display the balance of a given token holder.
